mapper.select: select device_code, device_value, device_time from ( select device_code, device_value, device_time, row_number() over(partition by device_code order by device_time desc) rn from device ) where rn = 1
mapper.insert: insert into device(device_id, device_type, device_code, device_value, device_time) values(dev_seq.nextval, #{deviceType}, #{deviceCode}, #{deviceValue}, #{deviceTime})
